text: Sornphet Sornsuphan (), or birthname Boonthan Klaylamang () was a famous Luk thung singer.ลือลูกทุ่งดัง‘ศรเพชร ศรสุพรรณ’ป่วยหนัก ถึงขั้นร้องเพลงไม่ได้ ลูกชายออกมาชี้แจงแล้ว ==Early life== Sornsuphan finished his education at Primary 4. He started a performer of Thai music in "" () of Dam Daen-Suphan, with Lieang Kanchana was supported him for stage. Next, he was khew with Phophin Phornsuphan. Phophin wrote songs for him, and was famous in 1970–1976. His popular music includes "'" (), "'" (), "'" (), "'" () and "'" ().จริงหรือไม่ที่"ศรเพชร ศรสุพรรณ"หยิ่ง" Since 2010, he has been in poor health, and has not appeared on stage."ศรเพชร ศรสุพรรณ"ป่วยขอบริจาคเลือดด่วน ==Discography== *' () *' () *' () *' () *' () *' () *' () *' () ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Thai male singers Category:People from Suphan Buri Province
title: Sornphet Sornsuphan
